preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 16.5 g of Gallium Oxide, 1.1 g of Rubidium Oxide, and 2.1 g of Samarium Oxide using an analytical balance. 
 2. Combine all powdered oxides in a clean, dry ceramic mixing bowl. 
 3. Use a pestle and mortar to grind the mixture thoroughly until a homogeneous powder is obtained.
